text: Linwood is a suburb of the city of Christchurch, New Zealand ==History== Linwood is one of Christchurch's older suburbs and was established in 1850. The Linwood Islamic Centre was the site of a mass shooting during the Christchurch mosque shootings on 15 March 2019. ==References== Category:Suburbs of Christchurch Category:1850s establishments in Oceania Category:19th-century establishments in New Zealand Category:1850 establishments
title: Linwood, New Zealand
